languages.text: Закончив разбор и анализ сервитора, техноматы однозначно заявили — единица полностью исправна. Ничто в самой сути лежащего перед нами растерзанного тела не говорило о возможной причине дефектов.

traits.locale_text: Закончив разбор и анализ сервитора, техноматы однозначно заявили — единица полностью исправна. Ничто в самой сути лежащего перед нами растерзанного тела не говорило о возможной причине дефектов.

languages.text: The disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.
languages.original_text: Закончив разбор и анализ сервитора, техноматы однозначно заявили — единица полностью исправна. Ничто в самой сути лежащего перед нами растерзанного тела не говорило о возможной причине дефектов.

traits.locale_text: Their disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

Their disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

The disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

The disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

The disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

languages.text: 解体と分析が完了し、テクノマットたちは一致した意見を述べた。このユニットは問題無く動作していた。眼前に横たわり解剖された体には、欠陥の原因についての洞察を提供する要因は何もなかった。
languages.original_text: The disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

traits.locale_text: 解体と分析が完了し、テクノマットたちは一致した意見を述べた。このユニットは問題無く動作していた。眼前に横たわり解剖された体には、欠陥の原因についての洞察を提供する要因は何もなかった。

languages.text: Le démontage et leur analyse terminés, les technomates furent formels : l'unité était en parfait état de fonctionnement. Rien dans le corps disséqué étendu devant nous ne pouvait expliquer les problèmes que nous avions constatés.
languages.original_text: The disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

traits.locale_text: Le démontage et leur analyse terminés, les technomates furent formels : l'unité était en parfait état de fonctionnement. Rien dans le corps disséqué étendu devant nous ne pouvait expliquer les problèmes que nous avions constatés.

languages.text: 拆解与分析完成之后，所有技工一致认为这台机仆处于正常工作状态。从这台被拆开的机仆身上，完全找不到发生故障的成因。
languages.original_text: The disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

traits.locale_text: 拆解与分析完成之后，所有技工一致认为这台奴工处于正常工作状态。从这台被拆开的奴工身上，完全找不到发生故障的成因。

languages.text: Con el desmantelamiento y el análisis completos, los tecnómatas llegaron a la conclusión de que la unidad estaba en perfecto estado. Nada en el cuerpo diseccionado que yacía frente a nosotros ofrecía ningún indicio sobre el origen de sus defectos.
languages.original_text: The disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

traits.locale_text: Con el desmantelamiento y el análisis completos, los tecnómatas llegaron a la conclusión de que la unidad estaba en perfecto estado. Nada en el cuerpo diseccionado que yacía frente a nosotros ofrecía ningún indicio sobre el origen de sus defectos.

languages.text: Nachdem die Demontage und Analyse abgeschlossen war, waren sich die Technomaten einig: Die Einheit war funktionsbereit. Der sezierte Körper, der vor uns lag, hatte keine Hinweise auf die Ursache für die Defekte ergeben.
languages.original_text: The disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem die Demontage und Analyse abgeschlossen war, waren sich die Technomaten einig: Die Einheit war funktionsbereit. Der sezierte Körper, der vor uns lag, hatte keine Hinweise auf die Ursache für die Defekte ergeben.

languages.text: Parçalanma ve analiz süreci tamamlandıktan sonra teknomatlar şöyle bir sonuca vardı: Önümüzde yatan parçalarına ayrılmış bedende defonun kaynağına dair hiçbir şey bulunamamıştı.
languages.original_text: The disassembly and analysis complete, the technomats concurred: the unit was in working order. Nothing in the dissected body that lay before us could provide any insight into the reason behind the defects.

traits.locale_text: Parçalanma ve analiz süreci tamamlandıktan sonra teknomatlar şöyle bir sonuca vardı: Önümüzde yatan parçalarına ayrılmış bedende defonun kaynağına dair hiçbir şey bulunamamıştı.
